document_data.mainbody:
mmur was a gofer in the kitchens of Castle Obarskyr in Suzail in the late 14 century DR.
In the  while preparing for the Council of the Dragon, the Master of Revels, Khaladan Mallowfaer, sent Emmur and Darlakan to fetch wagons and bring new chairs and stools from Zorsins Dock. He later sent Halance Tarandar after them, to make sure they didnt break everything.
